items.name: Ralakesh's Impatience
enchantMods: Damage Penetrates 10% of Enemy Elemental Resistances if you haven't Killed Recently
explicitMods: +25% to Cold Resistance
+25% to Chaos Resistance
30% increased Movement Speed
Lose all Frenzy, Endurance, and Power Charges when you Move

Minimum Endurance Charges equal to Maximum while stationary
Minimum Frenzy Charges equal to Maximum while stationary
Minimum Power Charges equal to Maximum while stationary
flavourText: For the immortal, what is the difference
between an age and an instant?

socketedItems.secDescrText: Throws a trap that damages and immobilises a single enemy for a duration based on how much damage was dealt. After the immobilise expires, a debuff remains on the enemy for a duration, lowering their movement speed by an amount which lessens over time. The affected enemy will take increased damage from traps and mines until the debuff expires. Modifiers to spell damage do not affect this skill's damage.
explicitMods: Deals 16 to 22 Physical Damage
Traps do not Trigger at the end of their Duration
Trap lasts 4 seconds
Base duration is 3.00 seconds
40% increased Skill Effect Duration
Locks enemy in place
Enemies take 25% increased Damage from Trap or Mine Hits
Enemies have 80% less Movement Speed when the Debuff starts
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies. If enemies are left below 10% of maximum life after being hit by these skills, they will be killed.
explicitMods: Kill Enemies that have 10% Life or lower when Hit by Supported Skills
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: Base duration is 1.00 seconds
20% increased Buff Duration per Endurance Charge removed
20% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
26% less Elemental Damage taken
26% less Physical Damage taken
15.0% less Physical Damage taken per Endurance Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.typeLine: Anomalous Cast when Damage Taken Support
socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 38 or lower
Supported Skills deal 65% less Damage
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 528 total Damage from Hits
Supported Skills have 20% increased Skill Effect Duration

socketedItems.secDescrText: Charges at a targeted location or enemy, pushing away enemies in your path and repeatedly dealing off-hand damage in a small area in front of you. You deal damage in a larger area when you reach the target. The further you travel, the more damage you deal, and the greater your chance of stunning enemies. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.

5 to 7 Added Physical Damage per 15 Armour or Evasion Rating on Shield
75% increased Stun Threshold reduction on enemies at Maximum charge distance
100% more Damage with Hits at Maximum Charge Distance

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a Void Sphere which Hinders enemies in an area around it, with the debuff being stronger on enemies closer to the sphere. It also regularly releases pulses of area damage. The Void Sphere will consume the corpses of any enemies which die in its area. Can only have one Void Sphere at a time.
explicitMods: Deals 27 to 40 Physical Damage
Base duration is 5.00 seconds
Pulses every 0.40 seconds
40% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Enemies in range are Hindered, with up to 30% reduced Movement Speed, based on distance from the Void Sphere

implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed AoE Gems
+2 to Level of Socketed Warcry Gems

flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
And I'd do it again in an instant.
